cyclone.name: BONNIE
cyclone.current_location: about 120 mi SE of Beaufort, South Carolina

motion.direction: Stationary (expected to begin NNW later overnight)

cyclone.trajectory: Forecast to drift north-northwest overnight, then move north and slowly northeast along the central and northern South Carolina coast toward North Carolina through the next 3-4 days
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: central South Carolina coast near Charleston/Beaufort

port.name: Port of Palm Beach District, FL

weather_observation.watch_coast: None in Florida; watches confined to the Carolinas coast
weather_observation.warning_coast: Savannah River GA to Little River Inlet SC under Tropical Storm Warning
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Georgia and South Carolina coasts spreading slowly northeastward to North Carolina
weather_observation.wind: Occasional gusty squalls possible, but sustained winds expected to remain below tropical-storm force at Port of Palm Beach.
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected along the Palm Beach coastline.
weather_observation.rainfall: Brief outer rainbands could bring light to moderate showers; totals generally under 1 inch.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Elevated rip-current risk along southeast Florida beaches.
